con:part.con:content: <!--Created by TIBCO WSDL--> <wsdl:definitions name="Untitled" targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bcservices" xmlns:tns="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bcservices" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:jms="http://www.tibco.com/namespaces/ws/2004/soap/binding/JMS" xmlns:soap1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:jndi="http://www.tibco.com/namespaces/ws/2004/soap/apis/jndi"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bcservices" xmlns:ns0="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:topeng="http://www.accenture.com/schemas/TOPENG/ESB_MPFSTOPENG_V_1_0"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_MessageHeader.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_Common.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://www.accenture.com/schemas/TOPENG/ESB_MPFSTOPENG_V_1_0" schemaLocation="ESB_MPFSTOPENG_V_1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_ChangeSubStatus.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_ChangeSubIdentity.xsd"/> <xs:element name="ChangeSubStatusRequestMsg"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element form="unqualified" name="RequestHeader" type="ns0:RequestHeader"/> <xs:element name="RequestBody"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element form="unqualified" name="ChangeSubStatusRequest" type="ns0:ChangeSubStatusRequest"/> <xs:element name="TopEngCommand" type="topeng:MMLCommandDet"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>MML Command to be send to TopEngine. The value will be send directly to TOPENGINE for Reconnecting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ChangeSubStatusRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ChangeSubStatusRequestMsg" name="ChangeSubStatusRequestMsg"/> name="ChangeSubIdentityRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ChangeSubIdentityRequestMsg" name="ChangeSubIdentityRequestMsg"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ChangeSubIdentityResultMessage"> <!--编辑使用 XMLSpy v2006 U (http://www.altova.com) 由 any (any)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:cbscommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>common structure of header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="SecurityInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LoginSystemCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is request system code which is defined in CBS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The operator ID which is defined in both CBS system and request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ChannelID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is channel ID which the operator belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OwnershipInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Entity ID which the customer belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Region ID which the customer belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>message header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BusinessCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Business operation code from request system (For example: function code in CRM system).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message. If request system resend a message, this field should be unchanged. For example: CRM can use "OrderID + OrderNodeID" as this field.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OwnershipInfo" type="cbscommon:OwnershipInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AccessSecurity" type="cbscommon:SecurityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is for security authentication for request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorInfo" type="cbscommon:OperatorInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It indicates the operator information of the request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccessMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TimeFormat" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TimeType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TimeZoneID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="requestingSystem" type="cbscommon:requestingSystem" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="cbscommon:ThirdPartyID" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Mao-20170322 <xs:element name="OrderID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>--> <xs:element name="OrderID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>0: success Other values: failure code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The brief description of result code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="requestingSystem" type="cbscommon:requestingSystem" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="cbscommon:ThirdPartyID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="requestingSystem"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="correlationID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="requestingApplicationName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="requestingServer" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="serviceContext" type="cbscommon:serviceContext" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="serviceContext"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="businessScenario" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="serviceOperation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="serviceDescription" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="versionNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int"/> </xs:schema>

time.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Tax"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TaxCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TaxAmount" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BalanceChgInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BalanceType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>客户</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="CustAccessCode"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="PrimaryIdentity" type="xs:string"> parent node.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustBasicInfo" type="bccommon:CustBasicInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="NoticeSuppress" minOccurs="0" <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.accenture.com/schemas/TOPENG/ESB_MPFSTOPENG_V_1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.accenture.com/schemas/TOPENG/ESB_MPFSTOPENG_V_1_0"> <xsd:complexType name="MMLCommandDet"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OperationType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ExtParamList" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>All the parameters required for the execution of the command will be provided in this complex attribute in the name-value pair format. For example, if the command requires IMSI as an attribute, then the name will be "IMSI" and value be IMSI value like "444440123456789"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ParameterInfo" type="AdditionalParam" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalParam"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Value" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DataType" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameter datatype. For example id the parameter is IMSI then datatype will be STRING.The values may be any datatype like string, integer,boolean etc or the value may be also ENUMERATION.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--编辑使用 XMLSpy v2006 U (http://www.altova.com) 由 any (any)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:bccommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_Common.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="ChangeSubStatusRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SubAccessCode" type="bccommon:SubAccessCode"/> <xs:element name="OpType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="OldStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="NewStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="HoldingDays" type="xs:integer" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used in customer application scenario. For example, the customer wants to suspend his mobile and auto-resume after X days.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is reserved for future extension</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="bccommon:SimpleProperty"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ChangeSubStatusResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OldStatus" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="NewStatus" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:bccommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_Common.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="ChangeSubIdentityRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SubAccessCode" type="bccommon:SubAccessCode"/> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="AddSubIdentity" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SubIdentityType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SubIdentity" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DelSubIdentity" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SubIdentityType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SubIdentity" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ModifySubIdentity" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OldSubIdentity" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="OldSubIdentityType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="NewSubIdentity" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
